Title: Relates to the powers of the division of housing and community renewal
Summary: Relates to the powers of the division of housing and community renewal; permits the division in cooperation with the NY housing finance agency, and the NY housing trust fund corporation and its subsidiaries to issue and impose orders, directives and assess actual and pecuniary penalties, or other remedies and relief necessary to assure compliance with the law.
LawCode: Amd ยง14, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to the powers of the division of housing and community renewal
